Planning and Zoning Commission
------------------------------

Planning & Zoning Commission - reviews and approves subdivision plats, requests for specific use permits, and other zoning matters. The members are appointed by City Council and are resident volunteers from the City.  
  
**Planning & Zoning Commission Members are:**

|  |  |  |
| --- | --- | --- |
| P&Z Position 1 | Don Jones | Chairman |
| P&Z Position 2 | Buck Ballas | Member |
| P&Z Position 3 | Dana Gompers | Member |
| P&Z Position 4 | Bill Ogden | Member |
| P&Z Position 5 | Chris DeZevallos | Member |
| P&Z Position 6 | Jay Cohen | Member |
| P&Z Position 7 | Tim Jones | Member |

**Downloads**

* [Planning & Zoning Plat Application](https://www.cityofpineypoint.com/upload/page/0108/docs/Planning_Zoning_Application.pdf)
* [Plat Help Sheet](https://www.cityofpineypoint.com/upload/page/0108/docs/Plat_Help_Sheet.pdf)
* [(Copy of Chapter 50) Procedure for Submission Plats](https://www.cityofpineypoint.com/upload/page/0108/docs/Procedure_for_Submission_of_Plat.pdf)
* [Tax Certificate Request Form](https://www.cityofpineypoint.com/upload/page/0108/docs/PZ%20Packet%20Documents/PZ%20Other%20Items/Tax%20Certificate%20Request%20Form.pdf)

[2026 Planning & Zoning Commission Schedule](https://www.cityofpineypoint.com/upload/page/0108/PLANNING%20AND%20ZONING%20MEETINGS%202026.pdf)

Secretary for the Commission Annette R. Arriaga

All of Piney Point Village is Zoned as Single Family, (No Commercial) SF1
